description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4tu71","text":"This protocol details the making of the following stock solutions used in Brimblecombe, K.R. et al. (2023):cocaine (inhibits the activity of dopamine transporters (DATs)), isradipine (inhibits L-type voltage-gated Ca2+ channels (LTCC)), nomifensine (inhibits monoamine re-uptake), lidocaine (blocks voltage-gated Na+- channels), dihydro-β-erythroidine (DHβE) (nicotinic acetlycholine receptor (nAChR) antagonist), 1-(3-chlorophenethyl)-3-cyclopentylpyrimidine-2,4,6-(1H,3H,5H)-trione (CP8) (a potent and highly selective CaV1.3 L-type calcium channel antagonist; see Protocol: Synthesis of 1-(3-chlorophenethyl)-3-cyclopentylpyrimidine-2,4,6-(1H,3H,5H)-trione (CP8)),  L-741,626 (inhibits D2 receptors), and water-soluble cholesterol (DAT function in Snca-null mice is augmented, see Threlfell et al., 2021).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":107,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":172,"length":10},{"style":"bold","offset":237,"length":11},{"style":"bold","offset":281,"length":9},{"style":"bold","offset":329,"length":29},{"style":"bold","offset":414,"length":75},{"style":"bold","offset":567,"length":98},{"style":"bold","offset":669,"length":9},{"style":"bold","offset":708,"length":26},{"style":"sup","offset":216,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":315,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":523,"length":1},{"style":"italic","offset":751,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":74,"length":32},{"key":1,"offset":567,"length":98},{"key":2,"offset":784,"length":22}],"data":{}},{"key":"5j159","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65fom","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"502E67B659F7455CB8DA877696B34E06","url":"https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/ejn.16180"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"97D4CB43ED6248EE8E0AA41AB6239399","url":"https://www.protocols.io/private/14A8171D9F4211EE886F0A58A9FEAC02"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"768BD47A42624A69AE20330287D36C8A","url":"https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fncel.2021.658244/full"}}}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"7neju","text":"Drug concentrations were chosen in accordance with previous studies (Acevedo-Rodriguez et al., 2014; Brimblecombe et al., 2015).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":69,"length":30},{"key":1,"offset":101,"length":25}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"53FFBF6DE5E041B6BDF709D1585A22DF","url":"https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/ejn.16180#ejn16180-bib-0002"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D296183763994D3B85FBAE9EA82A43DA","url":"https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/ejn.16180#ejn16180-bib-0010"}}}}
manuscript_citation: {"blocks":[{"key":"84or6","text":"Brimblecombe KR, Connor-Robson N, Bataille CJR, Roberts BM, Gracie C, O'Connor B, Te Water Naude R, Karthik G, Russell AJ, Wade-Martins R, Cragg SJ. Inhibition of striatal dopamine release by the L-type calcium channel inhibitor isradipine co-varies with risk factors for Parkinson's. Eur J Neurosci. 2023 Nov 8. doi: 10.1111/ejn.16180. Epub ahead of print. PMID: 37941514.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

(DHßE) (Mr 365.27, stock powder stored at room parent_collections.title: Brimblecombe, K.R. et al. (2023) Inhibition of striatal dopamine release by the L-type calcium channel inhibitor isradipine, co-varies with risk factors for Parkinson’s.

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9fcam","text":"Make 50 mL aliquots of 10 mM stock solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8d9i0","text":"add 3.4 mg per 1 mL dH2O","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":22,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38muh","text":"store at -20°C    ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eo9ec","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3a16n","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"clcg0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":72,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"4atk","text":"Controlled substance! Stored in locked cabinet. Keep log book up to date.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"lfns","text":"Make 50 µL aliquots of 10 mM stock solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":44}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ad52","text":"add 2.69 mL DMSO to 10 mg powder","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2pl72","text":"stored at -20°C   ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67i6k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ef1ah","text":"For each experiment, dilute 50 µL of 10 mM stock solution (one aliquot) in 100 mL of bicarbonate-buffered artificial cerebrospinal fluid (aCSF) solution for a final working concentration of 5 µM.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"811gb","text":"For each experiment, dilute 50 µL of 10 mM stock solution (one aliquot) in 100 mL aCSF for final working concentration of 5 µM.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2scg0","text":"Make 100 µL aliquots of 10 mM stock solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":45}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3u9pt","text":"add 3.54 mg per 1 mL 0.1 HCl","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64mm1","text":"stored at -20°C ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dh8ch","text":"For each experiment, dilute 100 µL of 10 mM stock solution (one aliquot) in 100 mL aCSF for final working concentration of 10 µM.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"26cfm","text":"Make 100 µL aliquots of 100 mM stock solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":46}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3mm3","text":"add 2.34 mg per 1 mL ethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4o7g1","text":"stored at -20°C ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ah6sg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7mk8s","text":"For each experiment, dilute 100 µL 100 mM stock solution (one aliquot) in 100 mL aCSF for final working concentration of 100 µM.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bk2h9","text":"Make 0.5 mL aliquots of 10 mM stock solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"708rs","text":"add 2.8 mL dH2O to 10 mg powder","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":13,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54jso","text":"store at -20°C    ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9rp68","text":"Make 100 µL aliquots of 1 mM working stock solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":52}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ftldf","text":"add 4.5 mL dH2O to 0.5 mL 10 mM stock solution ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":47}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79bad","text":"store at -20°C   ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ks7j","text":"For each experiment, dilute 100 µL of 1 mM working stock solution (one aliquot) in 100 mL of aCSF solution for a final working concentration of 1 µM.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eqp52","text":"Make 100 µL aliquots of 10 mM stock solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"33dht","text":"add 3.35 mg per 1 mL DMSO","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmhnd","text":"store at -20°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dmd9l","text":"For each experiment, dilute 100 µL 10 mM stock solution (one aliquot) in 100 mL aCSF for final working concentration of 100 µM.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1f61","text":"Make 100 µL aliquots of 10 mM stock solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5bsej","text":"add 2.93 mL DMSO to 10 mg powder","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8kplf","text":"store at -20°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bguo7","text":"Make 45 mg of cholesterol per gram:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bb6pm","text":"add 11.1 mg water-soluble cholesterol to aCSF","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bcmds","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7uqqa","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"avlgq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":57,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"1c316","text":"Contains 1 mM Me-ß-cyclodextrin to make it water soluble. Therefore, control experiments are conducted in 1 mM Me-ß-cyclodextrin as a vehicle control.","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"af1ur","text":"Make 20 µL aliquots of 0.5 M stock solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1daap","text":"add 655 mg per 1 mL dH2O  [Yes it really is this soluble!]","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":22,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1q2pn","text":"store at 4°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fq8o3","text":"For each experiment, dilute 10 µL 10 mM stock solution (one aliquot) in 100 mL aCSF for final working concentration of 1 µM.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bng01","text":"For each experiment dilute 20 µL 0.5M stock solution (one aliquot) in 10 mL aCSF for final working concentration of 1 mM.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Stock solutions of cocaine, isradipine, nomifensine, lidocaine, DHβE, CP8, L-741,626, and water-soluble cholesterol
